# iosxr_interface_bundle_ether (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface Bundle Ether configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_interface_bundle_ether" "example" {
  name = "Bundle-Ether10"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Interface configuration subcommands

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `arp_cache_limit` (Number) Set cache limit for ARP entries
- `arp_gratuitous_ignore` (Boolean) Ignore the receipt of Gratuitous ARP packets
- `arp_learning_disable` (Boolean) Disable dynamic learning of ARP entries
- `arp_learning_local` (Boolean) Enable dynamic learning only for local subnet only
- `arp_timeout` (Number) Set ARP cache timeout
- `bandwidth` (Number) Set the bandwidth of an interface
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_destination` (String) BFD IPv4 destination address
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_echo_minimum_interval` (Number) BFD IPv4 echo minimum interval
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_fast_detect` (Boolean) BFD IPv4 fast detect
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_minimum_interval` (Number) BFD IPv4 minimum interval
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_multiplier` (Number) BFD IPv4 multiplier
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_timers_nbr_unconfig` (Number) BFD IPv4 timers neighbor unconfig
- `bfd_address_family_ipv4_timers_start` (Number) BFD IPv4 timers start

- `bfd_address_family_ipv6_fast_detect` (Boolean) BFD IPv6 fast detect
- `bfd_address_family_ipv6_minimum_interval` (Number) BFD IPv6 minimum interval
- `bfd_address_family_ipv6_multiplier` (Number) BFD IPv6 multiplier

- `bfd_address_family_ipv6_timers_start` (Number) BFD IPv6 timers start
- `bfd_mode_cisco` (Boolean) Use Cisco BFD mode
- `bfd_mode_ietf` (Boolean) Use IETF standard for BoB
- `bundle_lacp_delay` (Number) Set the lacp-delay timeout for members of this bundle
- `bundle_lacp_fallback_timeout` (Number) Set the timeout for lacp-fallback
- `bundle_load_balancing_hash_dst_ip` (Boolean) Use the destination IP as the hash function
- `bundle_load_balancing_hash_src_ip` (Boolean) Use the source IP as the hash function
- `bundle_maximum_active_links` (Number) Set the maximum number of active links in this bundle
- `bundle_minimum_active_links` (Number) Set the number of active links needed to bring up this bundle
- `bundle_shutdown` (Boolean) Bring all links in the bundle down to Standby state
- `dampening` (Boolean) configure state dampening on the given interface
- `dampening_decay_half_life` (Number) Decay half life (in minutes)
- `dampening_max_suppress_time` (Number) Max suppress time (in minutes)
- `dampening_restart_penalty` (Number) Restart penalty
- `dampening_reuse_threshold` (Number) Reuse threshold
- `dampening_suppress_threshold` (Number) Suppress threshold

- `flow_ipv6_ingress_monitors` (Attributes List) Specify a flow monitor for packets (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--flow_ipv6_ingress_monitors))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ipv4_access_group_egress_acl` (String) Access-list name
- `ipv4_access_group_egress_hardware_count` (Boolean) Count packets in hardware

- `ipv4_netmask` (String) IP subnet mask
- `ipv4_point_to_point` (Boolean) Enable point-to-point handling for this interface.

- `ipv6_nd_ns_interval` (Number) Set advertised NS retransmission interval
- `ipv6_nd_other_config_flag` (Boolean) Hosts should use stateful protocol for non-address config
- `ipv6_nd_prefix_default_no_adv` (Boolean) Do not advertise prefix
- `ipv6_nd_prefix_default_no_autoconfig` (Boolean) Do not use prefix for autoconfiguration
- `ipv6_nd_ra_interval_max` (Number) Set IPv6 Router Advertisement Interval
- `ipv6_nd_ra_interval_min` (Number) Minimum RA Interval (sec). Must be less than 0.75 * maximum interval
- `ipv6_nd_ra_lifetime` (Number) Set IPv6 Router Advertisement Lifetime
- `ipv6_nd_reachable_time` (Number) Set advertised reachability time
- `ipv6_nd_redirects` (Boolean) Enable sending of ICMP Redirect messages
- `ipv6_nd_suppress_ra` (Boolean) Suppress IPv6 Router Advertisements
- `ipv6_nd_unicast_ra` (Boolean) Send Unicast Solicited IPv6 Router Advertisements
- `ipv6_tcp_mss_adjust` (Boolean) Enable tcp mss adjust on this interface
- `ipv6_unreachables_disable` (Boolean) Override sending of ICMP Unreachable messages
- `ipv6_verify_unicast_source_reachable_via_allow_default` (Boolean) Allow default route to match when checking source address
- `ipv6_verify_unicast_source_reachable_via_allow_self_ping` (Boolean) Allow router to ping itself (opens vulnerability in verification)
- `ipv6_verify_unicast_source_reachable_via_type` (String) Source reachable type
- `lacp_churn_logging` (String) Set parameters for logging of churn events
- `lacp_cisco_enable` (Boolean) Enable the use of Cisco LACP extensions
- `lacp_cisco_enable_link_order_signaled` (Boolean) Turn on processing of link ordering numbers
- `lacp_mode` (String) Set the LACP mode on bundle to be used by its member link
- `lacp_non_revertive` (Boolean) Set the bundle to lacp non-revertive mode
- `lacp_period` (Number) Set the period on bundle to be used by its member link
- `lacp_period_short` (Boolean) set the short period on bundle
- `lacp_switchover_suppress_flaps` (Number) Set the time for which to suppress flaps during a LACP switchover
- `lacp_system_mac` (String) Configure the system ID to use in LACP negotiations for this bundle.
- `lacp_system_priority` (Number) The system priority to use in LACP negotiations.
- `lldp` (Boolean) LLDP interface configuration commands
- `lldp_receive_disable` (Boolean) Disable LLDP RX on an interface
- `lldp_transmit_disable` (Boolean) Disable LLDP TX on an interface
- `load_interval` (Number) Specify interval for load calculation for an interface
- `logging_events_link_status` (Boolean) Enable interface and line-protocol state change alarms
- `mac_address` (String) Set the Mac address(xxxx.xxxx.xxxx) on an interface
- `mpls_mtu` (Number) Set the MPLS MTU for the interface
- `mtu` (Number) Set the MTU on an interface
- `multipoint` (Boolean) multipoint sub-interface
- `point_to_point` (Boolean) point-to-point sub-interface
- `proxy_arp` (Boolean) Enable proxy ARP
- `service_policy_input` (Attributes List) Configure a policy in the input direction (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_policy_input))
- `service_policy_output` (Attributes List) Configure a policy in the output direction (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_policy_output))
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the given interface
- `vrf` (String) Set VRF in which the interface operates
